name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D Showcase】 Anak Alien holoID Turun ke Bumi (？) #AiraniIofifteen3D【Airani Iofifteen ⧸ hololive ID】 [YHMGdX1kC00]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Iofi in the flower meadow, performing a call and response session with the audience, followed by a chaotic sequence where she is swarmed by many small versions of herself.
Transition sequence with a black screen and instrumental music.
Iofi in a floating island setting with a cherry blossom tree, talking about her interest in sign language and introducing herself in English, Japanese, and Indonesian.
Performance of the song 'Boku ga Kimi no Mimi ni Naru' using sign language.
scenes.song_name: Boku ga Kimi no Mimi ni Naru
